reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 152/18: REQUEST FOR ORDER TO COMPLY WITH PART II
reg_info.reg_name_text: REQUEST FOR ORDER TO COMPLY WITH PART II

content.content: 1. A request made under subsection 16 (5) of the Act shall be in the form titled “Part II Order Request Form”, as amended from time to time, that is available on the website of the Government of Ontario Central Forms Repository.
content.raw_html: 1. A request made under subsection 16 (5) of the Act shall be in the form titled “Part II Order Request Form”, as amended from time to time, that is available on the website of the Government of Ontario Central Forms Repository.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
